Articles.Content: Do they offer Experimental versions for bug testing, If so where do I find it.

If there has been one released it will show on the store download page. But there hasn\'t been one lately.

And just remember this game is in development and they are hard at work making the game as good as they can so that we enjoy it, so we just have to be patient so they don\'t become under pressure and rush things.

They don\'t release experimentals to the general public anymore, not after the .14 update. Instead, it\'s sent out to a group of chosen testers who will pick through it to make sure that all bugs have been documented and taken care of before the final version is released.
